Mendokusai

Tartarus

Beware of Dog IV

13 Aug 2019

I saw the dog again today, for the first time since January. No panic attack, no raised heartrate, no sweaty palms, nothing. A lot of progress has been made, and I’m glad I was reminded of that today.
